mapper.select:
SELECT QQ.QUESTION_ID, QQ.SPACE_ID, QQ.QUESTION_NO, QQ.TYPE, QQ.DESCRIPTION, QQ.END_TIME,
-- answers QA.ANSWER_ID, QA.ANSWER_NO, QA.DESCRIPTION AS ANSWER_DESCRIPTION, (QAH.ANSWER_ID IS NOT NULL) AS IS_ANSWERED FROM QES_QUESTION QQ INNER JOIN QES_ANSWER QA ON QQ.QUESTION_ID = QA.QUESTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T.* FROM QES_ANSWER_HISTORY T WHERE T.USER_ID = #{userId} ) QAH ON QAH.QUESTION_ID = QA.QUESTION_ID AND QAH.ANSWER_ID = QA.ANSWER_ID WHERE QQ.SPACE_ID = #{spaceId} ORDER BY QQ.QUESTION_NO ASC, QA.ANSWER_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QES_QUESTION ( SPACE_ID, QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_NO, TYPE, DESCRIPTION, END_TIME ) VALUES ( #{record.spaceId, jdbcType=OTHER}, #{record.questionId, jdbcType=OTHER}, ( SELECT 1 + COALESCE(MAX(Q.QUESTION_NO), 0) FROM QES_QUESTION Q WHERE Q.SPACE_ID = #{record.spaceId} ), #{record.type}, #{record.description}, #{record.endTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT QQ.SPACE_ID, QQ.QUESTION_ID FROM QES_QUESTION QQ INNER JOIN QES_SPACE QS ON QS.SPACE_ID = QQ.SPACE_ID INNER JOIN QES_USER_JOIN QUJ ON QUJ.SPACE_ID = QQ.SPACE_ID WHERE QQ.QUESTION_ID = #{questionId} AND QUJ.USER_ID = #{userId} AND QS.END_TIME > #{current} AND QQ.END_TIME > #{current}
